title: Broken Lovers
description: Everyone deserves a second chance.CassieLuke Steele was my first love, my first everything. But then he chose the life of a soldier over loving me. Smashing my young heart into a thousand pieces. Leaving me broken. He moved on so easily, I needed to move on, too.First step was landing a corporate job in Manhattan, second step was moving in with my best friends Jasmine and Lily and third step was dating again.Until fate had other plans.LukeI can never forget the look on Cassie’s face when I left for the Army after graduation. But I had to go. Not once, through all those years did I ever forget her. Her face was the only thing keeping me going, as I lived through the hell of a war that broke me. Now I’m back in civilization running my own cyber security company, in Manhattan and the last person I ever thought I would see again, was her.One meeting and everything between us comes flashing back, our chemistry burning as brightly as ever.Fate has given me a second chance and I'll stop at nothing to get her back.Broken Lovers is book one in the Lovers in the City series. A full length sexy standalone second chance romance with a billionaire damaged ex-military hero and a smart strong heroine. Guaranteed HEA and NO cheating. Adults only.
author: Cate Lane
